product_name: PUMA x RCB 2025 Men's Official Match Jersey
description: Show your support for your beloved cricket team with the PUMA x RCB 2025 Men's Official Match Jersey. This perfect replica of the official jersey proudly showcases the iconic RCB crest. Designed with a regular fit, v-neck and short sleeves for style and comfort, it's the perfect gear for serious fans. Be it cheering from the stadium stands or shouting in front of your TV, embody the true spirit of a champion. With each ball, run, and wicket, experience the thrill of victory or the agony of defeat, standing with your team, every step of the way. Regular Fit V neck Short sleeves PUMA cat logo branding RCB crest logo at chest
